sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Commission on Discrimination and Hate Crimes Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Commission on Discrimination and Hate Crimes Act.

sections.heading: Findings.  The General Assembly finds as follows:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds as follows:

sections.heading: Purposes of Commission.  The purposes of the Commission include, but are not limited to, the following:
sections.text: Purposes of Commission. The purposes of the Commission include, but are not limited to, the following:

sections.heading: Annual report. The Commission shall submit a report to the Governor and the General Assembly by March 30 of each year.
sections.text: Annual report. The Commission shall submit a report to the Governor and the General Assembly by March 30 of each year.

sections.heading: Other laws. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to contravene any federal law or any other State law.
sections.text: Other laws. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to contravene any federal law or any other State law.

sections.heading: Effect on Executive Order.   This Act supersedes
Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
